title: Encore: 'The Unwelcome Guest'
dc:creator: WBUR
description: This week, we're bringing back a listener favorite. Richard Kind ("Inside Out") stars in this Middle Eastern folktale about a clever man who teaches his village a thing or two about the dangers of judging a book by its cover.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Encore: 'The Unwelcome Guest'
